name: sortable
description: The Sortable utility provides support for the creation of a sortable list as well as the ability to join lists in various ways.
author: davglass

examples.name: sortable-float
examples.description: Sortable list example with floated nodes.

examples.name: sortable-multi
examples.description: Multiple Sortable Lists that are separate from one another.

examples.name: sortable-multi-full
examples.description: Multiple Sortable Lists that are fully joined together.

examples.name: sortable-multi-out
examples.description: Multiple Sortable Lists that are outer joined together.

examples.name: sortable-multi-in
examples.description: Multiple Sortable Lists that are inner joined together.

examples.name: sortable-fish
examples.description: A fish sorting example. Multiple sortable lists with floated nodes that are outer joined together.

examples.name: sortable-events
examples.description: Create a sortable list with drag-and-drop notifications.
